short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: ChatSearch is a free ChatGPT tool that enhances the efficiency of search engines. We have GPT4, Claude2, and Web access now!
short.de: Zeigen Sie die Antworten von ChatGPT gleichzeitig in den Bing-Suchergebnissen an.
short.es: Muestre las respuestas de ChatGPT en los resultados de búsqueda de Bing al mismo tiempo.
short.fr: Afficher les réponses de ChatGPT dans les résultats de recherche Bing en même temps.
short.he: הצג את התשובות של ChatGPT בתוצאות החיפוש של Bing בו-זמנית
short.hu: A ChatGPT válaszainak egyidejű megjelenítése a Bing keresési eredményei között
short.ja: ChatGPT の回答を Bing の検索結果に同時に表示する
short.ko: Bing 검색 결과에 ChatGPT의 답변을 동시에 표시
short.pt_PT: Mostrar as respostas do ChatGPT nos resultados de pesquisa do Bing ao mesmo tempo
short.ro: Afișați răspunsurile ChatGPT în rezultatele căutării Bing în același timp
short.ru: Одновременно показывать ответы ChatGPT в результатах поиска Bing
short.uk: Показувати відповіді ChatGPT у результатах пошуку Bing одночасно
short.zh_CN: ChatSearch是国内可用的、能提升搜索引擎效率的ChatGPT工具，可用GPT4,Claude2和联网等功能。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatSearch: ChatGPT for Search Engine - a free browser extension that aims to unleash the full potential of search engines like Bing, Google, Baidu, DuckDuckGo, and more. With AI tools powered by Microsoft Bing’s GPT-3.5, GPT-4, and Claude2, you can now easily access the powerful capabilities of artificial intelligence right from the search results page, taking your search experience to a whole new level. Install with just one click and start using it.

With ChatGPT for microsoft Bing, you can now take your Bing search experience to the next level by effortlessly accessing the power of ChatGPT's language generation technology right within your search results page.
Advantages of ChatGPT for Search Engine:

🚀 Enhance your search results in any search engine by integrating ChatGPT’s answers for users.
🥳 It is available for free use  without any restrictions or the need to register an account.
💬 Start chatting with ChatGPT instantly by clicking the plugin button.
🤖️ Model support is expanded. In addition to GPT-3.5, you can also use GPT-4 and Claude2 to improve the accuracy of information.
🔍 Search functionality is enhanced, allowing you to utilize the powerful summarization capabilities of ChatGPT or Claude2 for web content.
🌍 Internet connectivity is improved, eliminating gaps and providing you with the most accurate content based on real-time web information.

🛫 Learn in one minute:
1️⃣ Choose an API type, we recommend the Developer API (stable, free to use).
2️⃣ Search your questions on various search engines and view the ChatGPT answers generated on the right side by Search+.
3️⃣ Click the extension button to start chatting directly with ChatGPT.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions:
📌 Is ChatGPT for Search Engine free?
Yes, ChatGPT for Search Engine is free to use. Whether you are a domestic or international user, you can install it and use it immediately.
📌 What is the relationship between ChatGPT for Search Engine and ChatGPT?
ChatGPT for Search Engine is an AI tool developed based on the capabilities of the ChatGPT model, which has powerful ChatGPT abilities.
📌 What model does ChatGPT for Search Engine use?
ChatGPT for Search Engine supports GPT-3.5, GPT-4, and Claude-2 models. We will also support more large language models as soon as possible.

ChatSearch is your most reliable search engine enhancement tool. With the powerful AI models GPT-3.5, GPT-4, and Claude-2, it provides you with the highest quality search content. You can rely on ChatSearch to analyze and summarize web content intelligently, greatly enhancing the real-time and accuracy of your search results.

Elevate your content game with ChatGPT - the ultimate browser extension for unleashing the power of ChatGPT on the new Bing!
long.zh_CN:
ChatSearch：ChatGPT for Search Engine- 一个国内可免费使用的ChatGPT浏览器扩展，旨在释放 Bing,Google,Baidu,DuckDuckGo等搜索引擎的全部潜力。借助适用于 Microsoft Bing 的 GPT-3.5, GPT-4和Claude2的AI工具，您现在可以通过在搜索结果页面中轻松获得人工智能的强大功能，将您的搜索体验提升到一个新的水平。无需注册，无需梯子，一键安装即可使用。

👍ChatGPT for Search Engine 的优势：
1. 🚀增强你在任何搜索引擎中获得的搜索结果，集成ChatGPT的回答呈现给用户。
2. 🥳国内可直接免费使用，无需🪜、无需注册账号。
3. 💬点击插件按钮立即开始与ChatGPT聊天。
4. 🤖️模型支持增加，除了GPT-3.5，您还可以使用GPT-4和Claude2增加信息的准确性。
5. 🔍搜索功能增加，您可以借助强大的ChatGPT或Claude2智能总结网页内容。
6. 🌍联网功能增加，告别信息差，结合实时网络信息为您提供最准确的内容。

🛫教您一分钟上手：
1️⃣ 选择一种API类型，推荐开发者API（稳定、国内免费使用）。
2️⃣ 在各类搜索引擎查询问题，查看右侧Search+为您生成的ChatGPT解答。
3️⃣ 点击插件按钮，直接开始与ChatGPT聊天。

❓ 常见问题：
📌 ChatGPT for Search Engine 是免费的吗？
- ChatGPT for Search Engine 可以免费使用，无论您是国内还是国外用户都可以直接安装后立即使用。
📌 ChatGPT for Search Engine 和ChatGPT有什么关系？
- ChatGPT for Search Engine 是基于ChatGPT模型的能力开发的AI工具，它具备强大的ChatGPT能力。
📌 ChatGPT for Search Engine是什么模型？
 - ChatGPT for Search Engine支持GPT-3.5,GPT-4和Claude-2模型。至于更多的大语言模型，我们也会尽快支持。

ChatSeach是您最可靠的搜索引擎增强工具，它借助强大的AI模型：GPT-3.5,GPT-4和Claude-2为您提供最优质的搜索内容。您可以依靠ChatSearch来联网分析以及智能总结网页内容，为您的搜索结果极大增加实时性、准确性。
